DOC.HEADLINE: FOREIGN GOVERNMENT TOURIST OFFICES
DOC.TEXT: To get the most out of a trip , do your homework . Finding_out about the places you plan to visit will enhance your understanding and appreciation of them . Question your travel_agent , air or cruise line . Visit bookstores and libraries ; read guidebooks , magazines and newspaper_articles about your destinations . Good sources of information are the tourist offices representing the countries you plan to visit . They can provide maps and brochures about places of interest , plus information on currency , climate and clothing , driving , tours , shopping and tipping . What follows is a selected list of foreign government tourist offices . For information about a country not listed here , call the United Nations at ( 212 ) 963-1234 , wait through the recorded message for an operator , and ask_for the number of the country ' s U.N. delegation . ANTIGUA AND BARBUDA : Antigua_and_Barbuda Department of Tourism , 610 Fifth Ave. , Suite 311 , New York 10020 , ( 212 ) 541-4117 .
